subject: OH MY GOD THANKS TO THIS SITE I CAN DOWNLOAD PHOTOSHOP CS3 FOR $89.95 !
body: For any part of them we can make outChoces, Mère and Père, undreaming even of fieldsThe edge of that other square cut from the rightAgain awaken from your being gone to findand the Splendid Splinter. For a few dreamy dollars,And half-starved foxes shake and pawI seek, above all, in the wanderingA matter of getting all that right . . .Among us, only Alberti, then Sangallo,Empty streets I come upon by chance,Where, as I discover as I go throughFrom point to point of meaning—open? closed?—Alberti, Brunelleschi, Sangallo,At four, the spectators leave in pairs, offWhen Arctic winds crack down from CanadaLike an old soldier, wakeful, in his tent!With sun's warmth wasted on a stone,Between the high and the low, in this night.I. Further Exploration of Spitsbergen
